1 Year Extended Warranty Plan

from One Assist
(66)
  • Peace of mind : Protect Your device today against any manufacturing defects, which could cost you 50-60% of the product price to repair. Also get convenience of doorstep repairs service.
  • Tenure and Validity of the service contract: The plan will start after the Brand warranty ends & will be active as per the plan period. Only valid if purchased along with the new product with a valid manufacturer's warranty. Not valid for refurbished/ renewed products. Any condition/act that voids the manufacturer’s warranty would lead to termination of the plan.
  • What’s included and What’s excluded: All labor, spare parts, & transportation charges for repairing the mechanical defects & electric malfunctions of the phone will be covered as per the brand warranty. The plan does not cover Accidental or Liquid damages, Damage caused by unauthorized repairs, Accessories, Consumables, or parts that are not covered under the standard Brand warranty
  • Other benefits: Brand authorised service centre repairs. Only genuine spare parts are used. Free pick-up and drop. No hidden fees or one-time deductibles. Unlimited claims till invoice value
  • Delivery, Activation & How to claim: Delivery by e-mail only. No physical delivery. After ordering, for plan-related details, check 'Buyer/Seller messages' under Message Center at "amazon.in/msg" or check your Amazon regd email ID. You can raise a claim 24x7 through OneAssist app, website or helpline - 1800 123 3330
Learn more

Quess Care Total Protection Plan for 1 Year Protection for Mobile - Price Between 15001 to 20000 (Email Delivery)

from Quesscare
(346)
  • Validity : Quess Care total damage protection plan, 1 Year accidental damage and liquid damage protection. Enjoy peace of mind from cracked screens, liquid spills, hardware issues and accidental damages at zero additional cost for 1 year. FREE doorstep pick and drop service.
  • What’s covered : Cracked Screens, Liquid Spills, Hardware Issues and Accidental Damage.
  • For your comfort : (a) Digital WhatsApp delivery within 10 days (b) Auto-Activation (c) Complimentary Pickup and Drop (d) Service Request (1 Claim)
  • Remain stress free : (a) File claims through Amazon (b) Brand authorized technicians and genuine parts (c) 15 days’ repair or replacement or refund up to sum insured value with Policy T&C, How to claim : 1 Go to Your Orders - Get Product Support - File Claim. 2 : Go to quesscare.com - Enter your mobile number - File Claim. 3 : Download - QUESSCare App - Enter your mobile number - File Claim. 4 : Call 1-800-5721-144 for any support
  • Our Service Standards: 98.22% claim settlement ratio, 15 days to settle claims, 85% customer satisfaction. What's not covered : (a) theft (b) accessories (c) anything that is not covered within the brand warranty. Disclaimer : This plan is auto-activated and valid only if purchased along with the product on Amazon; this plan cannot be exercised standalone.
Learn more

Operating System Android 10.0
Cellular Technology 5G

About this item

  • 4 GB RAM | 128 GB ROM | Expandable Upto 2 TB
  • 17.22 cm (6.78 inch) Full HD+ Display
  • 108 MP + 2 MP+ AI Lens | 16MP Front Camera
  • 5000 mAh Li-ion Polymer Battery
  • Dimensity 6080 Processor
  • GST invoice available
 See more product details

Product description

Designed for both work and play, this Infinix NOTE 30 5G smartphone delivers effective performance with its striking design. Accompanied by a Dimensity 6080 5G processor with up to 16GB of RAM (8GB + 8GB) along with 256GB of storage space, an AI camera with 108MP, and a 45W all-round fast charger, this NOTE 30 5G smartphone comes with a hoard of awesome features, including ultrarapid network connectivity, enhanced performance, and flagship experience. Featuring an impressive 120 Hz FHD+ display, vlogging camera modes, and certified JBL-tuned audio, this phone can become your ideal choice with its awesome characteristics and sophisticated design.

What is in the box?

  • Handset, Adaptor, USB Type-C Cable, TPU Case, Sim Ejector Pin, Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card, Xclub Card

    To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyses reviews to verify trustworthiness.
